dc:description: Green glass.  Intact with crack across base.  Broken bubbles on neck and body.  Brown weathering.  Material fair.  Rim outsplayed horizontally, folded upward and inward and flattened on top.  Long cylindrical neck.  Constriction with mark of modelling tool at base of neck.  Triangular body with straight sides.  Base slightly concave with pontil mark.  Candlestick Unguentarium.
